ComicInfo.Summary:
Follow the Leader: Chuckie subverts the game of follow the leader
Sneakin' a Peek at Babs Bradley's Secret Diary: Buddy and Butch read Babs' diary
Cool! Hot! Boss!: Ed Roth style illustrations
Studs Kirby Is On the Air: Studs is back on the radio, but his talk show attracts few callers.
The Young and the Impressionable: Girly-Girl watches the soaps
Chet and Bunny Leeway Go For A Ride: Chet borrows his cousin's Corvette.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-30 13:16:27. [CVDB51574] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:34:56. [Issue ID 69220]
ComicInfo.Characters: Chuckie-Boy,Chet Leeway,Professor J. Henry Rhinegut,Bunny Leeway,Mrs Bradley,Buddy Bradley,Babs Bradley,Studs Kirby,Pa Bradley,Tate,Girly-Girl,Butch Bradley
ComicInfo.Title: Follow the Leader; Sneakin' a Peek at Babs Bradley's Secret Diary; Cool! Hot! Boss!; Studs Kirby Is On the Air; The Young and the Impressionable; Chet and Bunny Leeway Go For A Ride
